title: Constant High Latency
body: About an hour ago i started a league game and everything went great. Normal MS, no fps lag, everything was working fine. I then go to start a new game and my ping spiked all the way to 400 and constantly stayed there. I did router resets, checked for downloads and even tested other games for connection issues. The thing is, I only found connection issues for LoL. Has anyone else that has had this problem that could share to me what they did to fix it? Would greatly appreciate it.

replies.body:
It sounds like there's specifically an issue in your network routing to our servers. Before we can take a look at your network routing, I'd first like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network configurations are properly setup for League.

Please let me know if this caused any change.

Same been this way since around the time Kled released for me. It's only LOL I have a problem with. I'm about ready to not play the game again because it's full of bugs. They have all kinds of cash to pay for LCS events but none to stick into a server. It's pretty sad.
